mapper.select: SELECT YEARS, (COUNT1 - COUNT4) AS TENANTID FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(WORKINGDATE,'%m') as YEARS, SUM(CASE WHEN TYPE = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as COUNT4, SUM(CASE WHEN TYPE != '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as COUNT1 FROM workingday WHERE DATE_FORMAT(WORKINGDATE,'%Y%m') BETWEEN #{start} and #{end} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(WORKINGDATE,'%m')) CC
